    • Triangle Distribution Math

    Triangle Distribution Math

    Rob Carnell

    2018-12-16

    triangledistributionmath.Rmd

    Triangle Notation

    Triangle PDF

    \[f(x) = \left\{ \begin{array}{ll} \frac{h}{c-a}(x-a) & \mbox{if } a \leq x \leq c \\ \frac{h}{c-b}(x-b) & \mbox{if } c < x \leq b \\ 0 & \mbox{otherwise} \end{array} \right.\ \ \ \ (1)\]

    Integrating the pdf in equation (1) to solve for h

    \[\int f(x) dx = \frac{h}{c-a}\int_{a}^{c} (x-a) dx + \frac{h}{c-b} \int_{c}^{b} (x-b) dx\]

    \[=\frac{h}{c-a} \bigg[\frac{x^2}{2}-ax\bigg]_{a}^{c} + \frac{h}{c-b} \bigg[\frac{x^2}{2} - bx\bigg]_{c}^{b}\]

    \[=\frac{h}{2(c-a)}\big[c^2-2ac-a^2+2a^2\big] + \frac{h}{2(c-b)}\big[b^2-2b^2-c^2+2bc\big]\]

    \[=\frac{h}{2(c-a)(c-b)} \big[c^3-bc^2-2ac^2+2abc-a^2c+a^2b+2a^2c-2a^2b+b^2c-ab^2-2b^2c+2ab^2-c^3+ac^2+2bc^2-2abc\big]\]

    \[=\frac{h}{2(c-a)(c-b)}\big[bc^2-ac^2+a^2c-a^2b-b^2c+ab^2+abc-abc\big]\]

    \[=\frac{h}{2(c-a)(c-b)}\big[b(c^2-ac+ab-bc)-a(c^2-ac+ab-bc)\big]\]

    \[=\frac{h}{2(c-a)(c-b)}\big[b(c-a)(c-b)-a(c-a)(c-b)\big]=\frac{h(b-a)}{2}=1\]

    \[h=\frac{2}{b-a}\ \ \ \ (2)\]

    Substituting back into equation (1),

    \[f(x) = \left\{ \begin{array}{ll} \frac{2}{(b-a)(c-a)}(x-a) & \mbox{if } a \leq x \leq c \\ \frac{2}{(b-a)(c-b)}(x-b) & \mbox{if } c < x \leq b \\ 0 & \mbox{otherwise} \end{array} \right.\ \ \ \ (3)\]

    Triangle Mean

    Integrating equation (3) to find \(E(x)\),

    \[E(x)=\int xf(x)dx = \frac{h}{c-a}\int_a^c (x^2-ax) dx + \frac{h}{c-b}\int_c^b (x^2-bx) dx\]

    \[=\frac{h}{c-a} \bigg[\frac{x^3}{3}-\frac{ax^2}{2}\bigg]_a^c + \frac{h}{c-b} \bigg[\frac{x^3}{3}-\frac{bx^2}{2}\bigg]_c^b\]

    \[=\frac{h}{6(c-a)}\big[2c^3-3ac^2+a^3\big] + \frac{h}{6(c-b)}\big[-b^3-2c^3+3bc^2\big]\]

    \[=\frac{h}{6(c-a)(c-b)}\big[2c^4-2bc^3-3ac^3+3abc^2+a^3c-a^3b - b^3c+ab^3-2c^4+2ac^3+3bc^3-3abc^2\big]\]

    \[=\frac{h}{6(c-a)(c-b)}\big[bc^3-ac^3+a^3c-a^3b-b^3c+ab^3\big]\]

    \[=\frac{h}{6(c-a)(c-b)}\big[a(a^2c-a^2b)+b(-b^2c+ab^2)+c(bc^2-ac^2)\big]\]

    \[=\frac{1}{3(c-a)(c-b)(b-a)} \big[(a(bc^2-abc+ab^2-b^2c-ac^2+a^2c-a^2b+abc) + b(bc^2-abc+ab^2-b^2c-ac^2+a^2c-a^2b+abc) + c(bc^2-abc+ab^2-b^2c-ac^2+a^2c-a^2b+abc))\big]\]

    \[=\frac{1}{3(c-a)(c-b)(b-a)}\big[a(c-a)(c-b)(b-a)+b(c-a)(c-b)(b-a)+c(c-a)(c-b)(b-a)\big]\]

    \[=\frac{a+b+c}{3}\ \ \ \ (3)\]

    Logarithmic Triangle distribution

    Define:

    \[la=log_{\phi}(a),\ \ lb=log_{\phi}(b),\ \ lc=log_{\phi}(c),\ \ h=\frac{2}{lb-la}, \ \ \phi = \mbox{log base}\]

    \[f(z) = \left\{ \begin{array}{ll} \frac{h}{lc - la}(z - la) & \mbox{if } la \leq z \leq lc \\ \frac{h}{lc - lb}(z - lb) & \mbox{if } lc < z \leq lb \\ 0 & \mbox{otherwise} \end{array} \right.\ \ \ \ (4)\]

    However,

    \[E({\phi}^z) \neq {\phi}^{E(z)}\ \ \ \ (5)\]

    Therefore, transforming…

    \[Y={\phi}^Z\]

    \[Z=log_{\phi}(Y)\]

    \[w(y)=log_{\phi}(y)\]

    \[w'(y)=\frac{dz}{dy} = \frac{1}{yln({\phi})}\]

    \[g(y)=f(w(y))w'(y)\]

    \[g(y) = \left\{ \begin{array}{ll} \frac{2}{(lc-la)(lb-la)ln({\phi})}\frac{log_{\phi}(y) - la}{y} & \mbox{if } 0 < a \leq y \leq c \\ \frac{2}{(lc-lb)(lb-la)ln({\phi})}\frac{lob_{\phi}(y) - lb}{y} & \mbox{if } c < y \leq b \\ 0 & \mbox{otherwise} \end{array} \right.\ \ \ \ (5)\]

    Define:

    \[\beta_1=\frac{2}{(lc-la)(lb-la)}\]

    \[\beta_2=\frac{2}{(lc-lb)(lb-la)}\]

    Finding the CDF,

    \[G(y)=\int_{-\infty}^y g(y)dy\]

    \[G(a \leq y \leq c) = \frac{\beta_1}{ln({\phi})} \int_a^y \frac{ln(y)}{yln({\phi})}-\frac{la}{y}dy\]

    \[=\frac{\beta_1}{ln({\phi})} \bigg[\frac{ln^2(y)}{2ln({\phi})} - laln(y)\bigg]_a^y\]

    \[=\frac{\beta_1}{ln({\phi})} \bigg[\frac{ln^2(y)}{2ln({\phi})} - laln(y) - \frac{ln^2(a)}{2ln({\phi})} + laln(a)\bigg]\]

    \[=\beta_1 \bigg[\frac{log_{\phi}^2(y)}{2} - lalog_{\phi}(y) - \frac{la^2}{2} + la^2\bigg]\]

    \[G(c < y \leq b) = G(c) + \frac{\beta_2}{ln({\phi})} \int_c^y \frac{ln(y)}{yln({\phi})} - \frac{lb}{y}dy\]

    \[=G(c) + \frac{\beta_2}{ln({\phi})} \bigg[\frac{ln^2(y)}{2ln({\phi})} - lb ln(y)\bigg]_c^y\]

    \[=G(c) + \frac{\beta_2}{ln({\phi})} \bigg[\frac{ln^2(y)}{2ln({\phi})} - lb ln(y) - \frac{ln^2(c)}{2ln({\phi})} + lb ln(c)\bigg]\]

    \[=G(c) + \beta_2 \bigg[\frac{log_{\phi}^2(y)}{2} - lb log_{\phi}(y) - \frac{lc^2}{2} + lb lc\bigg]\]

    Checking that the CDF is 1 at b,

    \[G(b) = \frac{lc^2 - 2la lc + la^2}{(lc-la)(lb-la)} + \frac{-lb^2-lc^2+2lblc}{(lc-lb)(lb-la)}\]

    \[G(b) = \frac{lc-la}{lb-la} + \frac{-(lc-lb)}{lb-la} = 1\]

    Now calculating \(E(y)\),

    \[E(y) = \int_{-\infty}^y yg(y)dy\]

    \[=\frac{\beta_1}{ln({\phi})} \int_a^c \bigg[\frac{ln(y)}{ln({\phi})} - la\bigg]dy + \frac{\beta_2}{ln({\phi})} \int_c^b \bigg[\frac{ln(y)}{ln({\phi})} - lb]dy\]

    \[=\frac{\beta_1}{ln({\phi})} \bigg[\frac{yln(y)-y}{ln({\phi})} - lay\bigg]_a^c + \frac{\beta_2}{ln({\phi})} \bigg[\frac{yln(y)-y}{ln({\phi})} - lby\bigg]_c^b\]

    \[=\frac{\beta_1}{ln({\phi})} \bigg[\frac{cln(c)-c}{ln({\phi})} - cla - \frac{aln(a)-a}{ln({\phi})} + ala\bigg] + \frac{\beta_2}{ln({\phi})} \bigg[\frac{bln(b)-b}{ln({\phi})} - blb - \frac{cln(c)-c}{ln({\phi})} + clb\bigg]\]

    \[=\frac{\beta_1}{ln({\phi})} \bigg[clc - \frac{c}{ln({\phi})} - cla + \frac{a}{ln({\phi})}\bigg] + \frac{\beta_2}{ln({\phi})} \bigg[\frac{-b}{ln({\phi})} - clc + \frac{c}{ln({\phi})} + clb\bigg]\]
